reviews.review_msg: He is a real star! Linear algebra is a tough course, but Ladislav did everything to clearly explain all course material. Exams and tests were strongly connected to homework assignments and after all everyone received mark according to the work during the term! Strongly recommend him!

Ladislav does an admirable job at teaching a very difficult course. He explains things clearly, although his accent is a little hard to understand sometimes. He also goes quite quickly in lecture so you really have to focus. Midterms and final were difficult which is to be expected because the course itself is tough. Lots of concepts to remember.

He's a prof with good intentions. You can tell he tries to make sure you get the material but the notes he was using (not his) forced him to rush the lecture, every single time. You will need to study the notes and textbook to pass. He loves to use proofs so you're pretty much taking MATH240 as well. Tests are hard and expect to memorize proofs.

His lectures are clear and easy to follow. He does include some of the more simple proofs on his exams, but his calculation questions are not that difficult. Study his notes carefully and do the textbook problems in order to do well in this course.

Ladislav is a great lecturer and goes through everything clearly. However, his tests doesn't reflect what the course is actually supposed to be. He loves testing you with proofs because he originally teaches Macm 201. Math 240 is the course for proofs, not 232.  To pass, you need to practice questions beyond what he even gives you.
